resources.string: Q1. Why is FoodVilla doing this?

A1. At FoodVilla we strive to add value to your business. We understand the challenges you face on a daily basis in sourcing the best quality packaging material. FoodVilla Packaging Assist is to take care of all your packaging needs.
Q2. How are you guys different?

A2. Best products - We only list the products which have passed our tests and are the best suitable for delivery. They will help in giving a better consumer experience, so you can get repeated orders. Best prices - We have negotiated rates with our distributors exclusive for FoodVilla Restaurant. Convenience - No need to haggle for prices. No need to follow-up on delivery. We track all orders to ensure you have a hassle free experience.
Q3. Why is FoodVilla doing this?

A3. At FoodVilla we strive to add value to your business. We understand the challenges you face on a daily basis in sourcing the best quality packaging material. FoodVilla Packaging Assist is to take care of all your packaging needs.
